TopicTitle: The future of Windows 64-bit builds for KSP

Articles.Content: <figure><a href="http://goo.gl/0o5dND"><img alt="image" src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/5ec854229599595d1552e355333a5b7c/tumblr_inline_njbkd9t3OD1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></figure><p>This week’s stream of development news continues. Today KSP’s QA Director, Ted, comments on the future of Windows 64-bit builds for KSP. Read it on our <a href="http://goo.gl/0o5dND"><b>FORUMS</b></a><br/></p>
